title: 9/1! Renovated; HT/HW included; Pet ok; DW; Laundry on site

posting_body: Cozy, renovated Brighton one-bedroom/one-bathroom apartment available September 1st!
Heat and hot water included in rent.
** Virtual tour and online/remote leasing process available **
Call, text or email Gil regarding this apartment or your overall home search.
We have apartments all over Greater Boston.
